explains: adj. 州际的；州与州之间的
wordGroup: interstate commerce [经]州际贸易，州际商业；美国的州际贸易
interstate commerce commission 美国政府州际商务委员会

sentences.en: The Florida Highway Patrol shut down the 20-mile stretch of the interstate.
sentences.cn: 弗罗里达公路巡逻队关闭了20英里的州际公路段。

sentences.en: Interstate 295 is a 20-mile beltway that bypasses Jacksonville's busy downtown area.
sentences.cn: 295号州际公路是一条20英里长、绕过了杰克逊维尔的繁华市区的环路。

sentences.en: Above all, the interstate system provides individuals with what they enrich most: personal freedom of mobility.
sentences.cn: 最重要的是，州际公路系统为个人提供了他们最富有的东西：个人行动自由。
